response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and contribute greatly to your success. Given its immense value to you, I am confident it's worth more than its face value of $8,000. Considering its true worth of $15,000 to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored to recognize your potential and commitment. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 12000}
